citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult shall be made available to accompany APHIS officials during the inspection process.
A responsible adult was not available to allow access and accompany inspection on ( 4-3-2014 1:00 pm ).
Call me Jerry West at 240-461-9185 with a time when someone will normally be avilable for inspection.

ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
 A responsible adult shall be made available to accompany APHIS officials during the inspection process.
